greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of positive integers k for k <= n and gcd(k,n) = gcd(k+1,n).
program: (PARI) a(n) = if (n==1, 1, n*(n-1)/2*sumdiv(n, d, moebius(d)*numdiv(d)/d)) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 17 2013
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 29 2002
